title: Sinful Lust
description:
Emily 
Do you believe in hate at first sight?Well, I certainly didn’t.Until him.After the first disastrous meeting, I knew I wouldn’t go near a person who’s rude, arrogant, and an alleged manwhore ever again.But the universe had other plans for me. You see, the Englishman with a cocky smirk and an infuriatingly sexy accent I had the displeasure in meeting with? He also happens to be my boss.
Asher
I was minding my own business when a certain… tiny someone came into my life and I fell. Literally. Fell on the ground with her on top of me.The little firecracker gave me a piece of her mind and all I wanted to do was piss her off one more time. Because I can.So I did just that. Again and bloody again.
This is a standalone novella with a guaranteed HEA and NO cheating!
NOTE - Sinful Lust is a part of the Sinful Series but could be read on its own. For a better experience, we suggest reading Sinful Liaisons first.
author: Sanjana Nidhi
